trans-unit.source: Return a record containing multiple output parameters:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含多个输出参数的记录。

trans-unit.source: Return actual version of collation from operating system
trans-unit.target: 从操作系统返回实际的整理版本

trans-unit.source: Return captured substring(s) resulting from matching a POSIX regular expression to the string. See Section 9.7.3 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 返回将POSIX正则表达式与 string 匹配而获得的捕获子字符串。有关更多信息，请参见第9.7.3节。

trans-unit.source: Return captured substring(s) resulting from the first match of a POSIX regular expression to the string. See Section 9.7.3 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 返回从POSIX正则表达式的第一个匹配项到 string 捕获的子字符串。有关更多信息，请参见第9.7.3节。

trans-unit.source: Return first n characters in the string. When n is negative, return all but last |n| characters.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的前 n 个字符。当 n 为负数时，返回最后一个| n | 字符。

trans-unit.source: Return information about a file. Restricted to superusers by default, but other users can be granted EXECUTE to run the function.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个文件的信息。默认情况下只限于超级用户,但其他用户可以被授权EXECUTE来运行该函数。

trans-unit.source: Return last n characters in the string. When n is negative, return all but first |n| characters.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的最后 n 个字符。当 n 为负数时，返回除第一个|之外的所有内容。 n | 字符。

trans-unit.source: Return reversed string.
trans-unit.target: 返回反转的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Return the contents of a file. Restricted to superusers by default, but other users can be granted EXECUTE to run the function.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个文件的内容。默认情况下只限于超级用户,但其他用户可以被授予EXECUTE权限来运行该函数。

trans-unit.source: Return the contents of a text file. Restricted to superusers by default, but other users can be granted EXECUTE to run the function.
trans-unit.target: 返回文本文件的内容。默认情况下只限于超级用户,但其他用户可以被授予EXECUTE权限来运行该函数。

trans-unit.source: Return the given string suitably quoted to be used as a string literal in an SQL statement string. Embedded single-quotes and backslashes are properly doubled. Note that quote_literal returns null on null input; if the argument might be null, quote_nullable is often more suitable. See also Example 42.1.
trans-unit.target: 返回适当引用的给定字符串，以用作SQL语句字符串中的字符串文字。嵌入式单引号和反斜杠已正确加倍。注意 quote_literal 在空输入时返回空；如果参数可能为null，则 quote_nullable 通常更合适。另请参见示例42.1。

trans-unit.source: Return the given string suitably quoted to be used as a string literal in an SQL statement string; or, if the argument is null, return NULL. Embedded single-quotes and backslashes are properly doubled. See also Example 42.1.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的字符串，该字符串适当地用引号括起来用作SQL语句字符串中的字符串文字；或者，如果参数为null，则返回 NULL 。嵌入式单引号和反斜杠已正确加倍。另请参见示例42.1。

trans-unit.source: Return the given string suitably quoted to be used as an identifier in an SQL statement string. Quotes are added only if necessary (i.e., if the string contains non-identifier characters or would be case-folded). Embedded quotes are properly doubled. See also Example 42.1.
trans-unit.target: 返回适当引用的给定字符串，以用作SQL语句字符串中的标识符。仅在必要时才添加引号（即，如果字符串包含非标识符字符或将大小写折叠）。嵌入式引号正确加倍。另请参见示例42.1。

trans-unit.source: Return the replay location for the given replication origin. The parameter flush determines whether the corresponding local transaction will be guaranteed to have been flushed to disk or not.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定复制源的重播位置。参数 flush 确定是否将保证相应的本地事务已被刷新到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Return the replay location for the replication origin configured in the current session. The parameter flush determines whether the corresponding local transaction will be guaranteed to have been flushed to disk or not.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前会话中配置的复制源的重播位置。参数 flush 确定是否将保证相应的本地事务已被刷新到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Return the textual name of the given build phase number. The phase numbers are those reported during an index build via the pgstat_progress_update_param interface. The phase names are then exposed in the pg_stat_progress_create_index view.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定构建阶段号的文本名称。相编号是在通过 pgstat_progress_update_param 接口建立索引期间报告的相编号。然后在 pg_stat_progress_create_index 视图中公开阶段名称。

trans-unit.source: Return the top-most parent of a partition tree to which the given relation belongs.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定关系所属的分区树的最上层父节点。

trans-unit.source: Return the value most recently obtained by nextval for this sequence in the current session. (An error is reported if nextval has never been called for this sequence in this session.) Because this is returning a session-local value, it gives a predictable answer whether or not other sessions have executed nextval since the current session did.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前会话中 nextval 为此序列最近获取的值。（如果从未在此会话中为此序列调用 nextval ,则会报告一个错误。）由于此操作返回的是会话本地值，因此它提供了一个可预测的答案，即自当前会话执行以来，其他会话是否已执行 nextval 。

trans-unit.source: Return the value most recently returned by nextval in the current session. This function is identical to currval, except that instead of taking the sequence name as an argument it refers to whichever sequence nextval was most recently applied to in the current session. It is an error to call lastval if nextval has not yet been called in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前会话中 nextval 最近返回的值。此函数与 currval 相同，除了它不使用序列名称作为参数，而是引用当前会话中最新应用 nextval 的那个序列。如果当前会话中尚未调用 nextval ,则调用 lastval 是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Return type
trans-unit.target: 返回类型

trans-unit.source: Return value most recently obtained with nextval for any sequence
trans-unit.target: 任何序列的 nextval 最近获得的返回值

trans-unit.source: Return value most recently obtained with nextval for specified sequence
trans-unit.target: 指定序列的 nextval 最近获得的返回值

trans-unit.source: Returning Data From Modified Rows
trans-unit.target: 从修改的行中返回数据

trans-unit.source: Returning Data from Modified Rows
trans-unit.target: 从修改后的行中返回数据

trans-unit.source: Returning to our example:
trans-unit.target: 回到我们的例子。

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: Returns

trans-unit.source: Returns from_json as indented JSON text.
trans-unit.target: 返回 from_json 作为缩进的JSON文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns from_json with all object fields that have null values omitted. Other null values are untouched.
trans-unit.target: 返回 from_json ,其中所有具有空值的对象字段都被省略。其他空值保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Returns target with new_value inserted. If target section designated by path is in a JSONB array, new_value will be inserted before target or after if insert_after is true (default is false). If target section designated by path is in JSONB object, new_value will be inserted only if target does not exist. As with the path oriented operators, negative integers that appear in path count from the end of JSON arrays.
trans-unit.target: 返回插入了 new_value 的 target 。如果 path 指定的 target 节在JSONB数组中，则将在目标之前或在 insert_after 为true（默认值为 false ）之后插入 new_value 。如果 path 指定的 target 节位于JSONB对象中，则只有 target 不存在时才插入 new_value 。作为与该路径导向运营商，出现在负整数 path 从JSON数组末端计数。

trans-unit.source: Returns target with the section designated by path replaced by new_value, or with new_value added if create_missing is true (default is true) and the item designated by path does not exist. As with the path oriented operators, negative integers that appear in path count from the end of JSON arrays.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 path 指定的部分用 new_value 替换的 target ，或者如果 create_missing 为true（默认值为 true ）并且由 path 指定的项不存在，则添加 new_value 。作为与该路径导向运营商，出现在负整数 path 从JSON数组末端计数。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if its arguments have a similarity that is greater than the current similarity threshold set by pg_trgm.similarity_threshold.
trans-unit.target: 如果其参数的相似度大于 pg_trgm.similarity_threshold 设置的当前相似度阈值，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if its second argument has a continuous extent of an ordered trigram set that matches word boundaries, and its similarity to the trigram set of the first argument is greater than the current strict word similarity threshold set by the pg_trgm.strict_word_similarity_threshold parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回 true ，如果它的第二个参数具有有序集巽匹配单词边界的连续程度，其相似的卦集的第一个参数的比由当前严格单词相似性阈值设定越大 pg_trgm.strict_word_similarity_threshold 参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the similarity between the trigram set in the first argument and a continuous extent of an ordered trigram set in the second argument is greater than the current word similarity threshold set by pg_trgm.word_similarity_threshold parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回 true ，如果在第一个参数的卦集和在第二个参数的有序集合卦的连续程度之间的相似性比由当前的单词相似性阈值设定越大 pg_trgm.word_similarity_threshold 参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns count cryptographically strong random bytes. At most 1024 bytes can be extracted at a time. This is to avoid draining the randomness generator pool.
trans-unit.target: 返回 count 加密强度高的随机字节。一次最多可以提取1024个字节。这是为了避免耗尽随机性生成器池。

trans-unit.source: Returns target with new_value inserted. If the item designated by the path is an array element, new_value will be inserted before that item if insert_after is false (which is the default), or after it if insert_after is true. If the item designated by the path is an object field, new_value will be inserted only if the object does not already contain that key. All earlier steps in the path must exist, or the target is returned unchanged. As with the path oriented operators, negative integers that appear in the path count from the end of JSON arrays. If the last path step is an array index that is out of range, the new value is added at the beginning of the array if the index is negative, or at the end of the array if it is positive.
trans-unit.target: 返回插入了 new_value 的 target 。如果由指定的项目 path 是一个数组元素， new_value 将该项目之前是否插入 insert_after 为假（这是默认值），或之后，如果 insert_after 是真实的。如果 path 指定的项目是对象字段，则仅当对象尚未包含该键时才插入 new_value 。路径中的所有先前步骤必须存在，否则 target 将保持不变。如同路径面向运营商，负整数出现在 path 从JSON数组的末尾开始计数。如果最后一个路径步骤是超出范围的数组索引，则如果索引为负，则将新值添加到数组的开头，如果索引为正，则将新值添加到数组的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns target with the item designated by path replaced by new_value, or with new_value added if create_if_missing is true (which is the default) and the item designated by path does not exist. All earlier steps in the path must exist, or the target is returned unchanged. As with the path oriented operators, negative integers that appear in the path count from the end of JSON arrays. If the last path step is an array index that is out of range, and create_if_missing is true, the new value is added at the beginning of the array if the index is negative, or at the end of the array if it is positive.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 path 指定的项目用 new_value 替换的 target ，或者如果 create_if_missing 为true（默认值）并且由 path 指定的项目不存在，则添加 new_value 。路径中的所有先前步骤必须存在，否则 target 将保持不变。与面向路径的运算符一样，出现在 path 中的负整数从JSON数组的末尾开始计数。如果最后一个路径步骤是超出范围的数组索引，并且 create_if_missing 为true，则如果索引为负，则将新值添加到数组的开头，如果索引为正，则将新值添加到数组的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns value evaluated at the row that is offset rows after the current row within the partition; if there is no such row, instead returns default (which must be of the same type as value). Both offset and default are evaluated with respect to the current row. If omitted, offset defaults to 1 and default to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回在分区中当前行之后的 offset 行的行中求 value ；如果没有这样的行，则返回 default （必须与 value 具有相同的类型）。这两个 offset 和 default 相对于当前行评估。如果省略，则 offset 默认为1， default 为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns value evaluated at the row that is offset rows before the current row within the partition; if there is no such row, instead returns default (which must be of the same type as value). Both offset and default are evaluated with respect to the current row. If omitted, offset defaults to 1 and default to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回在分区中当前行之前的 offset 行的行中求 value ；如果没有这样的行，则返回 default （必须与 value 具有相同的类型）。这两个 offset 和 default 相对于当前行评估。如果省略，则 offset 默认为1， default 为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns value evaluated at the row that is the n'th row of the window frame (counting from 1); returns NULL if there is no such row.
trans-unit.target: 返回 value 在这就是行评价 n “窗框的第i行（从计数1）; 如果没有这样的行，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns value evaluated at the row that is the first row of the window frame.
trans-unit.target: 返回在作为窗口框架第一行的行上求 value 。

trans-unit.source: Returns value evaluated at the row that is the last row of the window frame.
trans-unit.target: 返回在作为窗口框架最后一行的那一行求 value 。

trans-unit.source: Returns JSON value pointed to by path_elems (equivalent to #> operator).
trans-unit.target: 返回 path_elems 所指向的JSON值（等效于 #> 运算符）。

trans-unit.source: Returns JSON value pointed to by path_elems as text (equivalent to #>> operator).
trans-unit.target: 以 text 形式返回 path_elems 指向的JSON值（等效于 #>> 运算符）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a “nil” UUID constant, which does not occur as a real UUID.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个“ nil” UUID常量，它不会作为真实的UUID出现。

trans-unit.source: Returns a bit mask indicating which GROUP BY expressions are not included in the current grouping set. Bits are assigned with the rightmost argument corresponding to the least-significant bit; each bit is 0 if the corresponding expression is included in the grouping criteria of the grouping set generating the current result row, and 1 if it is not included.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个位掩码，该掩码指示当前分组集中未包含哪些 GROUP BY 表达式。位分配了与最低有效位相对应的最右引数；如果将相应的表达式包含在生成当前结果行的分组集的分组条件中，则每个位为0；如果不包含，则为1。

trans-unit.source: Returns a box suitable for an indexed search using the cube@> operator for points within a given great circle distance of a location. Some points in this box are further than the specified great circle distance from the location, so a second check using earth_distance should be included in the query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个框适合使用索引搜索 cube @> 运营商的位置给定的大圆距离内的点。此框中的某些 earth_distance 该位置的指定大圆距离较远，因此在查询中应包括使用earth_distance进行的第二次检查。

trans-unit.source: Returns a box suitable for an indexed search using the cube @> operator for points within a given great circle distance of a location. Some points in this box are further than the specified great circle distance from the location, so a second check using earth_distance should be included in the query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个适合使用索引@cube @> 运算符的框，用于在位置的给定大圆距离内的点。此框中的某些 earth_distance 指定位置的指定大圆距离较远，因此在查询中应包括使用earth_distance进行的第二次检查。

trans-unit.source: Returns a constant designating the DNS namespace for UUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指定UUIDs的DNS命名空间的常量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a constant designating the ISO object identifier (OID) namespace for UUIDs. (This pertains to ASN.1 OIDs, which are unrelated to the OIDs used in PostgreSQL.)
trans-unit.target: 返回一个常量,指定UUIDs的ISO对象标识符(OID)命名空间。(这与ASN.1 OID有关,与PostgreSQL中使用的OID无关。)

trans-unit.source: Returns a constant designating the URL namespace for UUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指定UUIDs的URL命名空间的常量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a constant designating the X.500 distinguished name (DN) namespace for UUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个常量,指定UUIDs的X.500区分名称(DN)命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a current snapshot, a data structure showing which transaction IDs are now in-progress.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前快照，这是一个数据结构，显示哪些事务ID正在处理中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a number that indicates how similar the two arguments are. The range of the result is zero (indicating that the two strings are completely dissimilar) to one (indicating that the two strings are identical).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数字,表示两个参数的相似度。结果的范围是0(表示两个字符串完全不同)到1(表示两个字符串相同)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a number that indicates the greatest similarity between the set of trigrams in the first string and any continuous extent of an ordered set of trigrams in the second string. For details, see the explanation below.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示第一个字符串中的卦集与第二个字符串中的有序卦集的任何连续范围之间的最大相似度的数字。详情请看下面的解释。

trans-unit.source: Returns a palloc'd array of keys given a value to be queried; that is, query is the value on the right-hand side of an indexable operator whose left-hand side is the indexed column. n is the strategy number of the operator within the operator class (see Section 37.16.2). Often, extractQuery will need to consult n to determine the data type of query and the method it should use to extract key values. The number of returned keys must be stored into *nkeys. If any of the keys can be null, also palloc an array of *nkeysbool fields, store its address at *nullFlags, and set these null flags as needed. *nullFlags can be left NULL (its initial value) if all keys are non-null. The return value can be NULL if the query contains no keys.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定要查询值的palloc分配的键数组；也就是说， query 是可索引运算符右侧的值，该运算符的左侧是索引列。 n 是操作员类别中的操作员的策略编号（请参见37.16.2节）。通常， extractQuery 将需要咨询 n 以确定 query 的数据类型及其提取键值所使用的方法。返回的键数必须存储在 *nkeys 中。如果任何键可以为null，则还要分配 *nkeys bool 字段数组，并将其地址存储在 *nullFlags ，并根据需要设置这些空标志。如果所有键都不为空，则 *nullFlags 可以保留为 NULL （其初始值）。如果 query 包含任何键，则返回值可以为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a palloc'd array of keys given a value to be queried; that is, query is the value on the right-hand side of an indexable operator whose left-hand side is the indexed column. n is the strategy number of the operator within the operator class (see Section 37.16.2). Often, extractQuery will need to consult n to determine the data type of query and the method it should use to extract key values. The number of returned keys must be stored into *nkeys. If any of the keys can be null, also palloc an array of *nkeysbool fields, store its address at *nullFlags, and set these null flags as needed. *nullFlags can be left NULL (its initial value) if all keys are non-null. The return value can be NULL if the query contains no keys.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定要查询值的，由palloc分配的键数组；也就是说， query 是可索引运算符右侧的值，可索引运算符的左侧是索引列。 n 是操作员类别中的操作员的策略编号（请参见37.16.2节）。通常， extractQuery 将需要咨询 n 以确定 query 的数据类型以及提取键值所使用的方法。返回的键数必须存储在 *nkeys 中。如果任何键可以为null，则还要分配一个 *nkeys bool 字段数组，并将其地址存储在 *nullFlags ，并根据需要设置这些null标志。如果所有键都不为空，则 *nullFlags 可以保留为 NULL （其初始值）。如果 query 包含任何键，则返回值可以为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a palloc'd array of keys given an item to be indexed. The number of returned keys must be stored into *nkeys. If any of the keys can be null, also palloc an array of *nkeysbool fields, store its address at *nullFlags, and set these null flags as needed. *nullFlags can be left NULL (its initial value) if all keys are non-null. The return value can be NULL if the item contains no keys.
trans-unit.target: 给定要索引的项目，返回一个由palloc分配的键数组。返回的键数必须存储在 *nkeys 中。如果任何键可以为null，则还要分配一个 *nkeys bool 字段数组，将其地址存储在 *nullFlags ，并根据需要设置这些null标志。如果所有键都不为空，则 *nullFlags 可以保留为 NULL （其初始值）。如果该项不包含任何键，则返回值可以为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a query that searches for a match to the first given query followed by a match to the second given query at a distance of at distance lexemes, using the <N>tsquery operator. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回的查询进行匹配到第一给定查询搜索随后在一定距离处的匹配到第二给定查询 distance 词位，使用 <N> tsquery 运算符。例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a query that searches for a match to the first given query followed by a match to the second given query at a distance of exactly distance lexemes, using the <N>tsquery operator. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回的查询进行匹配到第一给定查询搜索，随后的匹配在完全相同的距离所述第二给定的查询 distance 词位，使用 <N> tsquery 运算符。例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a query that searches for a match to the first given query immediately followed by a match to the second given query, using the <-> (FOLLOWED BY) tsquery operator. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个查询，该查询立即使用 <-> （FOLLOWED BY） tsquery 运算符搜索与第一个给定查询的匹配项，然后立即搜索与第二个给定查询的匹配项。例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns a random value in the range 0.0 <= x < 1.0
trans-unit.target: 返回范围为0.0 <= x <1.0的随机值

trans-unit.source: Returns a record containing the file's size, last access time stamp, last modification time stamp, last file status change time stamp (Unix platforms only), file creation time stamp (Windows only), and a flag indicating if it is a directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含文件大小、最后一次访问时间戳、最后一次修改时间戳、最后一次文件状态改变时间戳(仅限Unix平台)、文件创建时间戳(仅限Windows)的记录,以及指示是否为目录的标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns a record of information about the backend with the specified PID, or one record for each active backend in the system if NULL is specified. The fields returned are a subset of those in the pg_stat_activity view.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关具有指定PID的后端信息的记录，如果指定 NULL ，则返回系统中每个活动后端的一条记录。返回的字段是 pg_stat_activity 视图中的子集。

trans-unit.source: Returns a record of information about the backend with the specified process ID, or one record for each active backend in the system if NULL is specified. The fields returned are a subset of those in the pg_stat_activity view.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关具有指定进程ID的后端的信息记录，如果指定了 NULL ，则返回系统中每个活动后端的一条记录。返回的字段是 pg_stat_activity 视图中的字段的子集。

trans-unit.source: Returns a relation's OID given the tablespace OID and filenode it is stored under. This is essentially the inverse mapping of pg_relation_filepath. For a relation in the database's default tablespace, the tablespace can be specified as zero. Returns NULL if no relation in the current database is associated with the given values.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个关系的OID，给定表空间的OID和存储在其下的文件节点。这本质上是 pg_relation_filepath 的逆映射。对于数据库默认表空间中的关系，可以将表空间指定为零。如果当前数据库中没有任何关联与给定值关联，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a role's name given its OID.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个角色的OID名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a row containing enough information to uniquely identify the database object specified by a type code and object name and argument arrays. The returned values are the ones that would be used in system catalogs such as pg_depend; they can be passed to other system functions such as pg_describe_object or pg_identify_object. classid is the OID of the system catalog containing the object; objid is the OID of the object itself, and objsubid is the sub-object ID, or zero if none. This function is the inverse of pg_identify_object_as_address.
trans-unit.target: 返回一行，其中包含足够的信息以唯一地标识由类型代码以及对象名称和参数数组指定的数据库对象。返回的值是将在系统目录（例如 pg_depend )中使用的值；它们可以传递给其他系统函数，例如 pg_describe_object 或 pg_identify_object 。 classid 是包含对象的系统目录的OID； objid 是对象本身的OID，而 objsubid 是子对象ID，如果没有则为零。此函数与 pg_identify_object_as_address 相反。

trans-unit.source: Returns a row containing enough information to uniquely identify the database object specified by catalog OID, object OID and sub-object ID. The returned information is independent of the current server, that is, it could be used to identify an identically named object in another server. type identifies the type of database object; object_names and object_args are text arrays that together form a reference to the object. These three values can be passed to pg_get_object_address to obtain the internal address of the object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一行，其中包含足够的信息以唯一地标识由目录OID，对象OID和子对象ID指定的数据库对象。返回的信息与当前服务器无关，也就是说，可以将其用于标识另一台服务器中名称相同的对象。 type 标识数据库对象的类型； object_names 和 object_args 是文本数组，它们共同构成对该对象的引用。这三个值可以传递给 pg_get_object_address 以获得对象的内部地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns a row containing enough information to uniquely identify the database object specified by catalog OID, object OID and sub-object ID. This information is intended to be machine-readable, and is never translated. type identifies the type of database object; schema is the schema name that the object belongs in, or NULL for object types that do not belong to schemas; name is the name of the object, quoted if necessary, if the name (along with schema name, if pertinent) is sufficient to uniquely identify the object, otherwise NULL; identity is the complete object identity, with the precise format depending on object type, and each name within the format being schema-qualified and quoted as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 返回一行，其中包含足够的信息以唯一地标识由目录OID，对象OID和子对象ID指定的数据库对象。此信息旨在机器可读，并且永远不会翻译。 type 标识数据库对象的类型； schema 是对象所属的模式名称，对于不属于模式的对象类型，则为 NULL ； name 是对象的名称，如果名称（连同模式名称，如果相关）足以唯一地标识对象，则在需要时用引号引起来，否则为 NULL ；否则为NULL；否则为NULL。 identity 是完整的对象标识，其精确格式取决于对象类型，并且格式中的每个名称均经过模式限定，并在需要时用引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of records describing the SQL keywords recognized by the server. The word column contains the keyword. The catcode column contains a category code: U for an unreserved keyword, C for a keyword that can be a column name, T for a keyword that can be a type or function name, or R for a fully reserved keyword. The catdesc column contains a possibly-localized string describing the category.
trans-unit.target: 返回一组描述服务器识别的SQL关键字的记录。该 word 列包含关键字。所述 catcode 列包含一个类别码： U 为未保留关键字， C 对于可以是列名，关键字 T 为，可以是一个类型或函数名或一个关键字 R 为一个完全保留的关键字。该 catdesc 列包含描述一类可能是本地化的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string describing the PostgreSQL server's version. You can also get this information from server_version, or for a machine-readable version use server_version_num. Software developers should use server_version_num (available since 8.2) or PQserverVersion instead of parsing the text version.
trans-unit.target: 返回描述PostgreSQL服务器版本的字符串。您也可以从server_version获取此信息，或者对于server -version版本，请使用server_version_num。软件开发人员应使用 server_version_num （从8.2开始可用）或 PQserverVersion 而不是解析文本版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a table that describes each type of token a parser specified by OID can recognize. See Section 12.8.2 for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表，该表描述OID指定的解析器可以识别的每种令牌类型。有关详细信息，请参见第12.8.2节。

trans-unit.source: Returns a table that describes each type of token the named parser can recognize. See Section 12.8.2 for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表，该表描述命名解析器可以识别的每种令牌。有关详细信息，请参见第12.8.2节。

trans-unit.source: Returns a text representation of the array's dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组尺寸的文本表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a textual description of a database object identified by catalog OID, object OID, and sub-object ID (such as a column number within a table; the sub-object ID is zero when referring to a whole object). This description is intended to be human-readable, and might be translated, depending on server configuration. This is especially useful to determine the identity of an object referenced in the pg_depend catalog.
trans-unit.target: 返回由目录OID，对象OID和子对象ID（例如表中的列号；在引用整个对象时，子对象ID为零）标识的数据库对象的文本描述。此描述旨在使用户易于阅读，并且可能会根据服务器配置进行翻译。这对于确定 pg_depend 目录中引用的对象的身份尤其有用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the “cost” of inserting the new entry into a particular branch of the tree. Items will be inserted down the path of least penalty in the tree. Values returned by penalty should be non-negative. If a negative value is returned, it will be treated as zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示将新条目插入树的特定分支中的“成本”。项目将被插入树中最小 penalty 的路径。 penalty 返回的值应为非负值。如果返回负值，它将被视为零。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector that lists the same lexemes as the given vector, but lacks any position or weight information. The result is usually much smaller than an unstripped vector, but it is also less useful. Relevance ranking does not work as well on stripped vectors as unstripped ones. Also, the <-> (FOLLOWED BY) tsquery operator will never match stripped input, since it cannot determine the distance between lexeme occurrences.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列出与给定向量相同的词素的向量，但缺少任何位置或权重信息。结果通常比未剥离的矢量小得多，但它的用处也较小。相关度排序在未剥离向量上的效果不如未剥离向量。同样， <-> （FOLLOWED BY） tsquery 运算符将永远不会匹配剥离的输入，因为它无法确定词素出现之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: Returns a version 4 (random) UUID.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个版本4(随机)的UUID。

trans-unit.source: Returns a version 4 (random) UUID. (Obsolete, this function is now also included in core PostgreSQL.)
trans-unit.target: 返回一个版本4(随机)的UUID。(过时了,这个函数现在也包含在核心PostgreSQL中。)

trans-unit.source: Returns all JSON items returned by the JSON path for the specified JSON value, as a JSON array. The optional vars and silent arguments act the same as for jsonb_path_exists.
trans-unit.target: 以JSON数组的形式返回JSON路径针对指定JSON值返回的所有JSON项目。可选的 vars 和 silent 参数的作用与 jsonb_path_exists 相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns all JSON items returned by the JSON path for the specified JSON value. The optional vars and silent arguments act the same as for jsonb_path_exists.
trans-unit.target: 返回JSON路径针对指定JSON值返回的所有JSON项目。可选的 vars 和 silent 参数的作用与 jsonb_path_exists 相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns all or part of a file. This function is identical to pg_read_file except that it can read arbitrary binary data, returning the result as bytea not text; accordingly, no encoding checks are performed.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件的全部或部分。该函数与 pg_read_file 相同，不同之处在于它可以读取任意二进制数据，并将结果返回为 bytea not text ；因此，不执行编码检查。

trans-unit.source: Returns all or part of a text file, starting at the given byte offset, returning at most length bytes (less if the end of file is reached first). If offset is negative, it is relative to the end of the file. If offset and length are omitted, the entire file is returned. The bytes read from the file are interpreted as a string in the database's encoding; an error is thrown if they are not valid in that encoding.
trans-unit.target: 返回全部或部分文本文件，从给定的字节 offset ，返回最大 length 字节（如果先到达文件末尾，则减少）。如果 offset 为负，则相对于文件末尾。如果省略 offset 和 length ，则返回整个文件。从文件读取的字节在数据库的编码中被解释为字符串。如果它们在该编码中无效，则会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns all values of the input enum type in an ordered array
trans-unit.target: 在一个有序的数组中返回所有输入枚举类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns all values of the input enum type in an ordered array.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个有序数组中所有输入枚举类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array filled with copies of the given value, having dimensions of the lengths specified by the second argument. The optional third argument supplies lower-bound values for each dimension (which default to all 1).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，该数组填充有给定值的副本，其长度的大小由第二个参数指定。可选的第三个参数为每个维度提供下界值（默认为全 1 ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the trigrams in the given string. (In practice this is seldom useful except for debugging.)
trans-unit.target: 返回给定字符串中所有卦象的数组。(在实践中,除了调试外,这很少有用。)

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of replacement lexemes if the input token is known to the dictionary, or an empty array if the token is known to the dictionary but it is a stop word, or NULL if it is not a known word. See Section 12.8.3 for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入令牌对于字典是已知的，则返回一个替换词素数组；如果字典对于字典是已知的但它是一个停用词，则返回一个空数组；如果它不是一个已知词，则返回NULL。有关详细信息，请参见第12.8.3节。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the names of all schemas presently in the effective search path, in their priority order. (Items in the current search_path setting that do not correspond to existing, searchable schemas are omitted.) If the Boolean argument is true, then implicitly-searched system schemas such as pg_catalog are included in the result.
trans-unit.target: 以优先级顺序返回有效搜索路径中当前所有模式名称的数组。（当前search_path设置中与现有的可搜索模式不对应的项目将被省略。）如果Boolean参数为 true ，则结果中将包含隐式搜索的系统模式，例如 pg_catalog 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the process ID(s) of the sessions that are blocking the server process with the specified process ID from acquiring a lock, or an empty array if there is no such server process or it is not blocked.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个进程ID的数组,该数组包含阻止服务器进程获取锁的会话,如果没有这样的服务器进程或者没有被阻止,则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the process ID(s) of the sessions that are blocking the server process with the specified process ID from acquiring a safe snapshot, or an empty array if there is no such server process or it is not blocked.
trans-unit.target: 返回阻止服务器进程获取安全快照的会话的进程ID的数组,如果没有这样的服务器进程或它没有被阻止,则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the subscripts of all occurrences of the second argument in the array given as first argument. The array must be one-dimensional. Comparisons are done using IS NOT DISTINCT FROM semantics, so it is possible to search for NULL. NULL is returned only if the array is NULL; if the value is not found in the array, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回作为第一个参数给出的数组中第二个参数的所有下标的下标数组。数组必须是一维的。比较是使用 IS NOT DISTINCT FROM 语义完成的，因此可以搜索 NULL 。 NULL 如果阵列是仅返回 NULL ; 如果在数组中找不到该值，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer ranging from 1 to the argument value, dividing the partition as equally as possible.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从1到参数值的整数,尽可能地平均分配。

trans-unit.source: Returns captured substring(s) resulting from matching a POSIX regular expression to the string; see Section 9.7.3.
trans-unit.target: 返回捕获的子字符串，该子字符串是通过将POSIX正则表达式与 string 匹配而得到的；见9.7.3节。

trans-unit.source: Returns captured substring(s) resulting from the first match of a POSIX regular expression to the string; see Section 9.7.3.
trans-unit.target: 返回从POSIX正则表达式的第一个匹配项到 string 捕获子字符串；见9.7.3节。

trans-unit.source: Returns changes in the slot slot_name, starting from the point at which since changes have been consumed last. If upto_lsn and upto_nchanges are NULL, logical decoding will continue until end of WAL. If upto_lsn is non-NULL, decoding will include only those transactions which commit prior to the specified LSN. If upto_nchanges is non-NULL, decoding will stop when the number of rows produced by decoding exceeds the specified value. Note, however, that the actual number of rows returned may be larger, since this limit is only checked after adding the rows produced when decoding each new transaction commit.
trans-unit.target: 返回插槽 slot_name 中的更改，从最后一次消耗更改的位置开始。如果 upto_lsn 和 upto_nchanges 为NULL，则逻辑解码将继续进行，直到WAL结束。如果 upto_lsn 为非NULL，则解码将仅包括那些在指定LSN之前提交的事务。如果 upto_nchanges 为非NULL，则当解码产生的行数超过指定值时，解码将停止。但是请注意，返回的实际行数可能会更大，因为仅在添加对每个新事务提交进行解码时产生的行之后才检查此限制。

trans-unit.source: Returns changes in the slot slot_name, starting from the point from which changes have been consumed last. If upto_lsn and upto_nchanges are NULL, logical decoding will continue until end of WAL. If upto_lsn is non-NULL, decoding will include only those transactions which commit prior to the specified LSN. If upto_nchanges is non-NULL, decoding will stop when the number of rows produced by decoding exceeds the specified value. Note, however, that the actual number of rows returned may be larger, since this limit is only checked after adding the rows produced when decoding each new transaction commit.
trans-unit.target: 返回插槽 slot_name 中的更改，从最后一次消费更改的位置开始。如果 upto_lsn 和 upto_nchanges 为NULL，则逻辑解码将继续进行，直到WAL结束。如果 upto_lsn 为非NULL，则解码将仅包括那些在指定LSN之前提交的事务。如果 upto_nchanges 为非NULL，则当解码产生的行数超过指定值时，解码将停止。但是请注意，返回的实际行数可能会更大，因为仅在添加对每个新事务提交进行解码时生成的行之后才检查此限制。

trans-unit.source: Returns current client encoding name.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前客户端编码名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns first n characters in the string, or when n is negative, returns all but last |n| characters.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的前 n 个字符，或者当 n 为负数时，返回除last |外的所有字符。 n | 人物。

trans-unit.source: Returns first array entry that is a descendant of ltree, or NULL if none.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一个数组项，它的后代 ltree ，或 NULL 如果没有。

trans-unit.source: Returns first array entry that is an ancestor of ltree, or NULL if none.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一个数组项，它的祖先 ltree ，或 NULL 如果没有。

trans-unit.source: Returns first array entry that matches lquery, or NULL if none.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 lquery 匹配的第一个数组条目，如果没有，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns first array entry that matches ltxtquery, or NULL if none.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 ltxtquery 匹配的第一个数组条目，如果没有，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns index of the first array element matching item, or 0 if no match.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一个匹配 item 数组元素的索引；如果不匹配，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns index of the first array element matching the right argument, or 0 if no match. (Same as idx function.)
trans-unit.target: 返回与右参数匹配的第一个数组元素的索引；如果不匹配，则返回0。（与 idx 函数相同。）

trans-unit.source: Returns information about cluster initialization state, as shown in Table 9.81.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关集群初始化状态的信息，如表9.81所示。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about cluster initialization state.
trans-unit.target: 返回集群初始化状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about current checkpoint state, as shown in Table 9.79.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关当前检查点状态的信息，如表9.79所示。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about current checkpoint state.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前检查点状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about current control file state, as shown in Table 9.80.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关当前控制文件状态的信息，如表9.80所示。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about current control file state.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前控制文件状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about recovery state, as shown in Table 9.82.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关恢复状态的信息，如表9.82所示。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about recovery state.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关恢复状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns internal information about the indexed columns' summary data. The return value must point to a palloc'd BrinOpcInfo, which has this definition:
trans-unit.target: 返回有关索引列的摘要数据的内部信息。返回值必须指向具有以下定义的palloc BrinOpcInfo ：

trans-unit.source: Returns last n characters in the string, or when n is negative, returns all but first |n| characters.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的最后 n 个字符，或者当 n 为负数时，返回除first |之外的所有字符。 n | 人物。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of bits in the binary string (8 times the octet_length).
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制字符串中的位数（ octet_length 的8倍）。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of bits in the bit string.
trans-unit.target: 返回比特串的位数。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of bits in the string (8 times the octet_length).
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的位数（是 octet_length 的8倍）。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of bytes in the binary string.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制字符串的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of bytes in the bit string.
trans-unit.target: 返回比特串中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of bytes in the string.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of bytes in the string. Since this version of the function accepts type character directly, it will not strip trailing spaces.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的字节数。由于此版本的函数直接接受类型 character ，因此不会删除尾随空格。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Returns number of labels in path.
trans-unit.target: 返回路径中标签的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns position of first occurrence of b in a, or -1 if not found.
trans-unit.target: 返回 b 在 a 中第一次出现的位置，如果未找到则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns position of first occurrence of b in a, or -1 if not found. The search starts at position offset; negative offset means start -offset labels from the end of the path.
trans-unit.target: 返回 b 在 a 中第一次出现的位置，如果未找到则返回-1。搜索从位置 offset 开始；负 offset 表示从路径末尾开始的 -offset 标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns serial number of current client certificate. The combination of certificate serial number and certificate issuer is guaranteed to uniquely identify a certificate (but not its owner — the owner ought to regularly change their keys, and get new certificates from the issuer).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前客户端证书的序列号。证书序列号和证书颁发者的组合可确保唯一地标识证书（但不能唯一标识证书的所有者，所有者应定期更改其密钥，并从颁发者那里获取新证书）。

trans-unit.source: Returns set of keys in the outermost JSON object.
trans-unit.target: Returns set of keys in the outermost JSON object.

trans-unit.source: Returns set of nodes (branches) to follow during tree search.
trans-unit.target: 返回树搜索过程中要遵循的节点(分支)集。

trans-unit.source: Returns starting index of specified substring within bits, or zero if it's not present.
trans-unit.target: 返回 bits 内指定 substring 起始索引，如果不存在则返回零。

trans-unit.source: Returns starting index of specified substring within bytes, or zero if it's not present.
trans-unit.target: 返回从指定的索引 substring 内 bytes ，或零，如果它不存在。

trans-unit.source: Returns starting index of specified substring within string, or zero if it's not present.
trans-unit.target: 返回从指定的索引 substring 内 string ，或零，如果它不存在。

trans-unit.source: Returns starting index of specified substring within string, or zero if it's not present. (Same as position(substring in string), but note the reversed argument order.)
trans-unit.target: 返回从指定的索引 substring 内 string ，或零，如果它不存在。（与 position(substring in string) ，但请注意参数顺序相反。）

trans-unit.source: Returns static information about the index implementation, including the data type OIDs of the prefix and node label data types.
trans-unit.target: 返回索引实现的静态信息,包括前缀和节点标签数据类型的OID。

trans-unit.source: Returns subpath of ltree from position start to position end-1 (counting from 0).
trans-unit.target: 返回 ltree 从位置 start 到位置 end -1的子路径（从0开始计数）。

trans-unit.source: Returns subpath of ltree starting at position offset, extending to end of path. If offset is negative, subpath starts that far from the end of the path.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ltree 的子路径，从位置 offset 开始，延伸到路径的末尾。如果 offset 为负，则子路径从该路径的末尾开始。

trans-unit.source: Returns subpath of ltree starting at position offset, with length len. If offset is negative, subpath starts that far from the end of the path. If len is negative, leaves that many labels off the end of the path.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ltree 的子路径，该子路径从位置 offset 开始，长度为 len 。如果 offset 为负，则子路径从该路径的末尾开始。如果 len 为负数，则将那么多标签留在路径的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns the “distance” between the arguments, that is one minus the similarity() value.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数之间的“距离”，即1减去 similarity() 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the “distance” between the arguments, that is one minus the strict_word_similarity() value.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数之间的“距离”，即“ 1”减去“ strict_word_similarity() ”值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the “distance” between the arguments, that is one minus the word_similarity() value.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数之间的“距离”，即“ 1”减去“ word_similarity() ”值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the “filenode” number currently assigned to the specified relation. The filenode is the base component of the file name(s) used for the relation (see Section 68.1 for more information). For most relations the result is the same as pg_class.relfilenode, but for certain system catalogs relfilenode is zero and this function must be used to get the correct value. The function returns NULL if passed a relation that does not have storage, such as a view.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前分配给指定关系的“ filenode”编号。filenode是用于关系的文件名的基本组成部分（有关更多信息，请参见第68.1节）。对于大多数关系，结果与 pg_class 相同。 relfilenode ，但是对于某些系统目录， relfilenode 为零，并且必须使用此函数来获取正确的值。如果传递了没有存储的关系（例如视图），则该函数将返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the aclitem array as a set of rows. If the grantee is the pseudo-role PUBLIC, it is represented by zero in the grantee column. Each granted privilege is represented as SELECT, INSERT, etc. Note that each privilege is broken out as a separate row, so only one keyword appears in the privilege_type column.
trans-unit.target: 以一组行的 aclitem 返回aclitem数组。如果被授予者是伪角色PUBLIC，则在被 grantee 列中用零表示。每个授予的特权都表示为 SELECT ， INSERT 等。请注意，每个特权被分解为单独的行，因此， privilege_type 列中仅出现一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the n-th coordinate value for the lower left corner of the cube.
trans-unit.target: 返回立方体左下角的第 n 个坐标值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the n-th coordinate value for the upper right corner of the cube.
trans-unit.target: 返回多维数据集右上角的第 n 个坐标值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the xmax of a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: 返回快照的 xmax 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the xmin of a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: 返回快照的 xmin 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the n-th coordinate value for the lower left corner of the cube.
trans-unit.target: 返回多维数据集左下角的第 n 个坐标值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the n-th coordinate value for the upper right corner of the cube.
trans-unit.target: 返回多维数据集右上角的第 n 个坐标值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the AND-combination of the two given queries.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个给定查询的AND-组合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP address as text, ignoring the netmask.
trans-unit.target: 以文本形式返回IP地址,忽略netmask。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP address of the client connected to this backend.
trans-unit.target: 返回连接到这个后台的客户端的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP address of the current client, or NULL if the current connection is via a Unix-domain socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前客户端的IP地址，如果当前连接通过Unix域套接字，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP address on which the server accepted the current connection, or NULL if the current connection is via a Unix-domain socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器接受当前连接的IP地址，如果当前连接通过Unix域套接字，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP port number of the current client, or NULL if the current connection is via a Unix-domain socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前客户端的IP端口号；如果当前连接通过Unix域套接字，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP port number on which the server accepted the current connection, or NULL if the current connection is via a Unix-domain socket.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器接受当前连接的IP端口号；如果当前连接通过Unix域套接字，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OID of the current default text search configuration (as set by default_text_search_config).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前默认文本搜索配置（由default_text_search_config设置）的OID 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OID of the current session's temporary schema, or zero if it has none (because it has not created any temporary tables).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前会话的临时模式的OID,如果没有,则返回0(因为它没有创建任何临时表)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OID of the data type of the value that is passed to it. This can be helpful for troubleshooting or dynamically constructing SQL queries. The function is declared as returning regtype, which is an OID alias type (see Section 8.19); this means that it is the same as an OID for comparison purposes but displays as a type name.
trans-unit.target: 返回传递给它的值的数据类型的OID。这对于故障排除或动态构建SQL查询可能会有所帮助。该函数被声明为returning regtype ，这是OID别名类型（请参见第8.19节）；这意味着它与OID出于比较目的相同，但显示为类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OID of the database this backend is connected to.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个后台所连接的数据库的OID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OID of the user logged into this backend.
trans-unit.target: 返回登录该后台的用户的OID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the OR-combination of the two given queries.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个给定查询的OR组合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the SQL name for a data type that is identified by its type OID and possibly a type modifier. Pass NULL for the type modifier if no specific modifier is known.
trans-unit.target: 返回由类型OID和可能的类型修饰符标识的数据类型的SQL名称。如果不知道类型修饰符,则传递NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the TCP port number that the client is using for communication.
trans-unit.target: 返回客户端用于通信的TCP端口号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the TIDs of non-all-visible tuples stored in pages marked all-visible in the visibility map. If this function returns a non-empty set of TIDs, the visibility map is corrupt.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在可见性地图中标记为全可见的页面中的非全可见元组的TID。如果该函数返回非空的TID集,则说明可见性地图已损坏。

trans-unit.source: Returns the TIDs of non-frozen tuples stored in pages marked all-frozen in the visibility map. If this function returns a non-empty set of TIDs, the visibility map is corrupt.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在可见性地图中标记为全部冻结的页面中的非冻结元组的TID。如果该函数返回非空的TID集,则说明可见性地图已损坏。

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual version of the collation object as it is currently installed in the operating system. If this is different from the value in pg_collation.collversion, then objects depending on the collation might need to be rebuilt. See also ALTER COLLATION.
trans-unit.target: 返回归类对象的实际版本，因为该对象当前已安装在操作系统中。如果这与 pg_collation 的值不同。 collversion ，则可能需要重建取决于排序规则的对象。另请参阅ALTER COLLATION。

trans-unit.source: Returns the address's family: 4 for IPv4, 6 for IPv6.
trans-unit.target: 返回地址的族：对于IPv4为 4 ，对于IPv6为 6 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the all-visible and all-frozen bits in the visibility map for each block of the given relation, plus the PD_ALL_VISIBLE bit of each block.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定关系的每个块的可见性图中的所有可见和所有冻结位，以及每个块的 PD_ALL_VISIBLE 位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the all-visible and all-frozen bits in the visibility map for each block of the given relation.
trans-unit.target: Returns the all-visible and all-frozen bits in the visibility map for each block of the given relation.

trans-unit.source: Returns the all-visible and all-frozen bits in the visibility map for the given block of the given relation, plus the PD_ALL_VISIBLE bit of that block.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定关系的给定块的可见性图中的所有可见和所有冻结位，以及该块的 PD_ALL_VISIBLE 位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the all-visible and all-frozen bits in the visibility map for the given block of the given relation.
trans-unit.target: Returns the all-visible and all-frozen bits in the visibility map for the given block of the given relation.

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of free space on the page of the relation, specified by blkno, according to the FSM.
trans-unit.target: 根据FSM 返回由 blkno 指定的关系页面上的可用空间量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the array as a JSON array. A PostgreSQL multidimensional array becomes a JSON array of arrays. Line feeds will be added between dimension-1 elements if pretty_bool is true.
trans-unit.target: 将数组作为JSON数组返回。PostgreSQL多维数组变成数组的JSON数组。如果 pretty_bool 为true，则将在维度1元素之间添加换行符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the assumed radius of the Earth.
trans-unit.target: 返回地球的假设半径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the character with the given code. In UTF8 encoding the argument is treated as a Unicode code point. In other multibyte encodings the argument must designate an ASCII character. chr(0) is disallowed because text data types cannot store that character.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定代码的字符。在UTF8编码中，该参数被视为Unicode代码点。在其他多字节编码中，参数必须指定一个ASCII字符。不允许使用 chr(0) ，因为文本数据类型无法存储该字符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the client domain, the current security label of the client.
trans-unit.target: 返回客户端域,客户端当前的安全标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns the comment for a database object specified by its OID alone. This is deprecated since there is no guarantee that OIDs are unique across different system catalogs; therefore, the wrong comment might be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回仅由其OID指定的数据库对象的注释。不建议使用此方法，因为不能保证OID在不同的系统目录中是唯一的。因此，可能会返回错误的评论。

trans-unit.source: Returns the comment for a database object specified by its OID and the name of the containing system catalog. For example, obj_description(123456, 'pg_class') would retrieve the comment for the table with OID 123456.
trans-unit.target: 返回由其OID和包含的系统目录的名称指定的数据库对象的注释。例如， obj_description(123456, 'pg_class') 将检索OID为123456的表的注释。

trans-unit.source: Returns the comment for a shared database object specified by its OID and the name of the containing system catalog. This is just like obj_description except that it is used for retrieving comments on shared objects (that is, databases, roles, and tablespaces). Some system catalogs are global to all databases within each cluster, and the descriptions for objects in them are stored globally as well.
trans-unit.target: 返回由共享数据库对象的OID和包含的系统目录的名称指定的注释。就像 obj_description 一样，只不过它用于检索共享对象（即数据库，角色和表空间）上的注释。一些系统目录对于每个集群中的所有数据库都是全局的，并且其中对象的描述也都全局存储。

trans-unit.source: Returns the comment for a table column, which is specified by the OID of its table and its column number. (obj_description cannot be used for table columns, since columns do not have OIDs of their own.)
trans-unit.target: 返回表列的注释，该注释由其表的OID及其列号指定。（ obj_description 不能用于表列，因为列本身没有OID。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the commit timestamp of a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个事务的提交时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cumulative distribution, that is (number of partition rows preceding or peers with current row) / (total partition rows). The value thus ranges from 1/N to 1.
trans-unit.target: 返回累积分布，即（在前的分区行数或与当前行对等的分区行数）/（分区的总行数）。因此，该值的范围是1 / N 到1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current nesting level of PostgreSQL triggers (0 if not called, directly or indirectly, from inside a trigger).
trans-unit.target: 返回PostgreSQL触发器的当前嵌套级别(如果没有直接或间接从触发器内部调用,则为0)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current similarity threshold used by the % operator. This sets the minimum similarity between two words for them to be considered similar enough to be misspellings of each other, for example (deprecated).
trans-unit.target: 返回 % 运算符使用的当前相似性阈值。这就设置了两个单词之间的最小相似度，以使它们被认为足够相似，例如彼此拼写错误（已弃用）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current similarity threshold used by the % operator. This sets the minimum similarity between two words for them to be considered similar enough to be misspellings of each other, for example. (Deprecated; instead use SHOWpg_trgm.similarity_threshold.)
trans-unit.target: 返回 % 运算符使用的当前相似性阈值。例如，这设置了两个单词之间的最小相似度，以使它们被认为足够相似以至于彼此拼写错误。（已弃用；请改用 SHOW pg_trgm.similarity_threshold 。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the current status of the weak mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回弱模式的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current transaction's ID, or NULL if no ID is assigned yet. (It's best to use this variant if the transaction might otherwise be read-only, to avoid unnecessary consumption of an XID.)
trans-unit.target: 返回当前交易的ID，如果尚未分配ID，则返回 NULL 。（如果事务可能是只读的，则最好使用此变体，以避免不必要的XID消耗。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the current transaction's ID. It will assign a new one if the current transaction does not have one already (because it has not performed any database updates).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前事务的ID。如果当前事务没有ID,它将分配一个新的ID(因为它没有执行任何数据库更新)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the setting setting_name. If there is no such setting, current_setting throws an error unless missing_ok is supplied and is true. This function corresponds to the SQL command SHOW.
trans-unit.target: 返回设置 setting_name 的当前值。如果没有这样的设置，除非提供了 missing_ok 并且它为 true ,否则 current_setting 会引发错误。此函数对应于SQL命令 SHOW 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current write-ahead log flush location (see notes below).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的写入式日志冲洗位置(见下文注释)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current write-ahead log insert location (see notes below).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的写前日志插入位置(见下面的注释)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current write-ahead log write location (see notes below).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的写前日志写入位置(见下文注释)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between two cubes. If both cubes are points, this is the normal distance function.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个立方体之间的距离。如果两个立方体都是点,则为法向距离函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the entire file path name (relative to the database cluster's data directory, PGDATA) of the relation.
trans-unit.target: 返回关系的整个文件路径名（相对于数据库集群的数据目录 PGDATA ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file system path that this tablespace is located in.
trans-unit.target: 返回该表空间所在的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first JSON item returned by the JSON path for the specified JSON value. Returns NULL if there are no results. The optional vars and silent arguments act the same as for jsonb_path_exists.
trans-unit.target: 返回JSON路径针对指定JSON值返回的第一个JSON项。如果没有结果，则返回 NULL 。可选的 vars 和 silent 参数的作用与 jsonb_path_exists 相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first value of the input enum type
trans-unit.target: 返回输入枚举类型的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first value of the input enum type.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入枚举类型的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fraction (0–1) of the asynchronous notification queue's maximum size that is currently occupied by notifications that are waiting to be processed. See LISTEN and NOTIFY for more information.
trans-unit.target: 返回异步通知队列的最大大小的分数（0–1），当前等待处理的通知占用该部分。有关更多信息，请参见LISTEN和NOTIFY。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full issuer name of the current client certificate, converting character data into the current database encoding. Encoding conversions are handled the same as for ssl_client_dn.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前客户端证书的颁发者全名，将字符数据转换为当前数据库编码。编码转换的处理方式与 ssl_client_dn 相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full subject of the current client certificate, converting character data into the current database encoding. It is assumed that if you use non-ASCII characters in the certificate names, your database is able to represent these characters, too. If your database uses the SQL_ASCII encoding, non-ASCII characters in the name will be represented as UTF-8 sequences.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前客户证书的完整主题,将字符数据转换为当前数据库的编码。假定如果你在证书名称中使用了非ASCII字符,你的数据库也能够表示这些字符。如果你的数据库使用SQL_ASCII编码,那么名称中的非ASCII字符将被表示为UTF-8序列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the given string suitably quoted to be used as a string literal in an SQL statement string. Embedded single-quotes and backslashes are properly doubled. Note that quote_literal returns null on null input; if the argument might be null, quote_nullable is often more suitable. See also Example 42.1.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的字符串，该字符串适当地用引号括起来用作SQL语句字符串中的字符串文字。嵌入的单引号和反斜杠已正确加倍。请注意， quote_literal 在输入为null时返回null。如果参数可能为null，则 quote_nullable 通常更合适。另请参见示例42.1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the given string suitably quoted to be used as a string literal in an SQL statement string; or, if the argument is null, returns NULL. Embedded single-quotes and backslashes are properly doubled. See also Example 42.1.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的字符串，该字符串适当地用引号括起来用作SQL语句字符串中的字符串文字；或者，如果参数为null，则返回 NULL 。嵌入的单引号和反斜杠已正确加倍。另请参见示例42.1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the given string suitably quoted to be used as an identifier in an SQL statement string. Quotes are added only if necessary (i.e., if the string contains non-identifier characters or would be case-folded). Embedded quotes are properly doubled. See also Example 42.1.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定的字符串，该字符串适当地用引号括起来用作SQL语句字符串中的标识符。仅在必要时才添加引号（即，如果字符串包含非标识符字符或将大小写折叠）。嵌入的报价已正确加倍。另请参见示例42.1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the great circle distance between two points on the surface of the Earth.
trans-unit.target: 返回地球表面两点之间的大圆距离。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last value of the input enum type
trans-unit.target: 返回输入枚举类型的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last value of the input enum type.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入枚举类型的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last write-ahead log location that has been received and synced to disk by streaming replication. While streaming replication is in progress this will increase monotonically. If recovery has completed then this will remain static at the location of the last WAL record received and synced to disk during recovery. If streaming replication is disabled, or if it has not yet started, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过流复制已接收并同步到磁盘的最后一个预写日志位置。在进行流复制时，这将单调增加。如果恢复已完成，则它将在接收到的最后一个WAL记录的位置保持静态，并在恢复过程中同步到磁盘。如果流复制已禁用，或者尚未开始，则该函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last write-ahead log location that has been replayed during recovery. If recovery is still in progress this will increase monotonically. If recovery has completed then this will remain static at the location of the last WAL record applied during recovery. When the server has been started normally without recovery, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回恢复期间已重播的最后一个预写日志位置。如果恢复仍在进行中，它将单调增加。如果恢复已完成，则它将在恢复期间应用的最后一个WAL记录的位置保持不变。当服务器正常启动但没有恢复时，该函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the latitude in degrees of a point on the surface of the Earth.
trans-unit.target: 返回地球表面某点的纬度,单位为度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the requested array dimension.
trans-unit.target: 返回请求的数组维度的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a point on the surface of the Earth given its latitude (argument 1) and longitude (argument 2) in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回地球表面一个点的位置,给定其纬度(参数1)和经度(参数2),单位为度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the longitude in degrees of a point on the surface of the Earth.
trans-unit.target: 返回地球表面某点的经度,单位为度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the lower bound of the requested array dimension.
trans-unit.target: 返回请求的数组维度的下界。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the cipher used for the SSL connection (e.g. DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA).
trans-unit.target: 返回用于SSL连接的密码名称(如DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the cipher used for the SSL connection (e.g., DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA).
trans-unit.target: 返回用于SSL连接的密码名称(例如,DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the collation of the value that is passed to it. The value is quoted and schema-qualified if necessary. If no collation was derived for the argument expression, then NULL is returned. If the argument is not of a collatable data type, then an error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回传递给它的值的排序规则的名称。该值用引号引起来，并在必要时用模式限定。如果没有为参数表达式派生排序规则，则返回 NULL 。如果参数不是可排序的数据类型，则会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the current database. (Databases are called “catalogs” in the SQL standard, so current_catalog is the standard's spelling.)
trans-unit.target: 返回当前数据库的名称。（数据库在SQL标准中称为“目录”，因此 current_catalog 是标准的拼写。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the protocol used for the SSL connection (e.g. TLSv1.0 TLSv1.1, or TLSv1.2).
trans-unit.target: 返回用于SSL连接的协议名称(如TLSv1.0、TLSv1.1或TLSv1.2)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the protocol used for the SSL connection (e.g., TLSv1.0, TLSv1.1, or TLSv1.2).
trans-unit.target: 返回用于SSL连接的协议名称(如TLSv1.0、TLSv1.1或TLSv1.2)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the schema that is first in the search path (or a null value if the search path is empty). This is the schema that will be used for any tables or other named objects that are created without specifying a target schema.
trans-unit.target: 返回搜索路径中第一个模式的名称(如果搜索路径为空,则返回空值)。这是在没有指定目标模式的情况下创建的任何表或其他命名对象所使用的模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the sequence associated with a column, or NULL if no sequence is associated with the column. If the column is an identity column, the associated sequence is the sequence internally created for that column. For columns created using one of the serial types (serial, smallserial, bigserial), it is the sequence created for that serial column definition. In the latter case, the association can be modified or removed with ALTER SEQUENCE OWNED BY. (This function probably should have been called pg_get_owned_sequence; its current name reflects the fact that it has historically been used with serial-type columns.) The first parameter is a table name with optional schema, and the second parameter is a column name. Because the first parameter potentially contains both schema and table names, it is parsed per usual SQL rules, meaning it is lower-cased by default. The second parameter, being just a column name, is treated literally and so has its case preserved. The result is suitably formatted for passing to the sequence functions (see Section 9.17).
trans-unit.target: 返回与列关联的序列的名称，如果没有序列与该列关联，则返回NULL。如果该列是标识列，则关联的序列是为该列内部创建的序列。对于使用一种串行类型（ serial ， smallserial ， bigserial ）创建的列，这是为该串行列定义创建的序列。在后一种情况下，可以使用 ALTER SEQUENCE OWNED BY 修改或删除关联。（此功能可能应该被称为 pg_get_owned_sequence ; 它的当前名称反映了它在历史上一直用于串行类型列的事实。）第一个参数是带有可选模式的表名，第二个参数是列名。由于第一个参数可能同时包含模式名称和表名称，因此将根据常规SQL规则对其进行解析，这意味着默认情况下将其转换为小写字母。第二个参数只是一个列名，将按字面意义对待，因此保留其大小写。对结果进行适当地格式化，以传递给序列函数（请参见第9.17节）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name, size, and last modification time (mtime) of each ordinary file in the server's WAL archive status directory (pg_wal/archive_status). Filenames beginning with a dot, directories, and other special files are excluded.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器的WAL存档状态目录（ pg_wal/archive_status ）中每个普通文件的名称，大小和最后修改时间（mtime ）。以点，目录和其他特殊文件开头的文件名将被排除。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name, size, and last modification time (mtime) of each ordinary file in the server's log directory. Filenames beginning with a dot, directories, and other special files are excluded.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器日志目录中每个普通文件的名称、大小和最后修改时间(mtime)。不包括以点开头的文件名、目录和其他特殊文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name, size, and last modification time (mtime) of each ordinary file in the server's write-ahead log (WAL) directory. Filenames beginning with a dot, directories, and other special files are excluded.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器写前日志(WAL)目录中每个普通文件的名称、大小和最后修改时间(mtime)。以点号开头的文件名、目录和其他特殊文件不包括在内。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name, size, and last modification time (mtime) of each ordinary file in the temporary file directory for the specified tablespace. If tablespace is not provided, the pg_default tablespace is examined. Filenames beginning with a dot, directories, and other special files are excluded.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 tablespace 的临时文件目录中每个普通文件的名称，大小和最后修改时间（mtime）。如果 tablespace 中没有提供， pg_default 表进行检查。以点，目录和其他特殊文件开头的文件名将被排除。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of all files (and directories and other special files) in the specified directory. The include_dot_dirs parameter indicates whether “.” and “..” are to be included in the result set; the default is to exclude them. Including them can be useful when missing_ok is true, to distinguish an empty directory from a non-existent directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定目录中所有文件（以及目录和其他特殊文件）的名称。该 include_dot_dirs 参数指示“” 和“ ..”将包含在结果集中；默认是排除它们。当 missing_ok 为 true 时，将它们包括在内对于将空目录与不存在的目录区分开是很有用的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the negation (NOT) of the given query.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定查询的否定(NOT)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the netmask length in bits.
trans-unit.target: 返回网罩的长度,单位为比特。

trans-unit.source: Returns the network part of the address, zeroing out whatever is to the right of the netmask. (This is equivalent to casting the value to cidr.)
trans-unit.target: 返回地址的网络部分，将网络掩码右边的内容清零。（这等效于将值强制转换为 cidr 。）

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of all-visible pages and the number of all-frozen pages in the relation according to the visibility map.
trans-unit.target: 根据可见性地图,返回关系中所有可见页面的数量和所有冻结页面的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bytes in the binary string.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制字符串的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters in the binary string, assuming that it is text in the given encoding.
trans-unit.target: 返回二进制字符串中的字符数，假设它是给定 encoding 中的文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串中的字符数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组的维数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of dimensions of the cube.
trans-unit.target: 返回立方体的尺寸数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in the outermost JSON array.
trans-unit.target: 返回最外层JSON数组中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements in the top-level JSON array.
trans-unit.target: 返回顶层JSON数组中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of lexemes in the tsvector.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tsvector 中的词素数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of lexemes plus operators in the tsquery.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tsquery 中的词素加运算符的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of lexemes stored in the vector.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储在向量中的词条数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of nodes (lexemes plus operators) in a tsquery. This function is useful to determine if the query is meaningful (returns > 0), or contains only stop words (returns 0). Examples:
trans-unit.target: 返回 tsquery 中节点的数量（词法加运算符）。此函数对于确定 query 是否有意义（返回> 0）或仅包含停用词（返回0）很有用。例子：

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of non-null arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回非空参数的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of null arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回空参数的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of points. Available for path, polygon.
trans-unit.target: 返回点数。可用于 path ， polygon 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of the bucket in which operand falls given an array listing the lower bounds of the buckets. Returns 0 for an input less than the first lower bound. operand and the array elements can be of any type having standard comparison operators. The thresholds array must be sorted, smallest first, or unexpected results will be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 在给定列出了存储桶下限的数组的情况下，返回 operand 所属的存储桶的编号。对于小于第一个下限的输入，返回 0 。 operand 和数组元素可以是具有标准比较运算符的任何类型。必须对 thresholds 数组进行排序，最小的优先，否则将获得意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of the bucket in which operand falls in a histogram having count equal-width buckets spanning the range low to high. Returns 0 or count+1 for an input outside that range.
trans-unit.target: 返回 operand 落入直方图中的存储桶的数量，该直方图中 count 相等宽度的存储桶的范围从 low 到 high 。对于超出该范围的输入，返回 0 或 count+1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of the current row within its partition, counting from 1.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前分区内的行数,从1开始计算。

trans-unit.source: Returns the numeric code of the first character of the argument. In UTF8 encoding, returns the Unicode code point of the character. In other multibyte encodings, the argument must be an ASCII character.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数中第一个字符的数字代码。在UTF8编码中,返回该字符的Unicode码点,在其他多字节编码中,参数必须是ASCII字符。在其他多字节编码中,参数必须是ASCII字符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the path name of the log file currently in use by the logging collector. The path includes the log_directory directory and the individual log file name. The result is NULL if the logging collector is disabled. When multiple log files exist, each in a different format, pg_current_logfile without an argument returns the path of the file having the first format found in the ordered list: stderr, csvlog. NULL is returned if no log file has any of these formats. To request information about a specific log file format, supply either csvlog or stderr as the value of the optional parameter. The result is NULL if the log format requested is not configured in log_destination. The result reflects the contents of the current_logfiles file.
trans-unit.target: 返回日志收集器当前正在使用的日志文件的路径名。该路径包括log_directory目录和单个日志文件名。如果禁用了日志收集器，则结果为 NULL 。当存在多个日志文件时，每个日志文件具有不同的格式，不带参数的 pg_current_logfile 返回具有在有序列表中找到的第一种格式的文件的路径： stderr ， csvlog 。如果没有任何格式的日志文件，则返回 NULL 。要请求有关特定日志文件格式的信息，请提供 csvlog 或 stderr 作为可选参数的值。结果为 NULL 如果未在log_destination中配置请求的日志格式。结果反映了 current_logfiles 文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the portion of a tsquery that can be used for searching an index. This function is useful for detecting unindexable queries, for example those containing only stop words or only negated terms. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回 tsquery 中可用于搜索索引的部分。此功能对于检测无法索引的查询（例如仅包含停用词或否定词的查询）很有用。例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the process ID of the server process attached to the current session.
trans-unit.target: 返回连接到当前会话的服务器进程的进程ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the process ID of this backend.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个后台的进程ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the range between the two given enum values, as an ordered array. The values must be from the same enum type. If the first parameter is null, the result will start with the first value of the enum type. If the second parameter is null, the result will end with the last value of the enum type.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个给定枚举值之间的范围,作为一个有序数组。这些值必须来自同一个枚举类型。如果第一个参数为空,结果将以枚举类型的第一个值开始。如果第二个参数为空,结果将以枚举类型的最后一个值结束。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rank of the current row, with gaps; that is, the row_number of the first row in its peer group.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前行的等级（带间隔）；也就是说，其对等组中第一行的 row_number 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the rank of the current row, without gaps; this function effectively counts peer groups.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前行的排名,没有空隙;该函数有效地计算了同行组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the relative rank of the current row, that is (rank - 1) / (total partition rows - 1). The value thus ranges from 0 to 1 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前行的相对排名，即（ rank -1）/（总分区行-1）。因此，该值的范围是0到1（含）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the replay location for the given replication origin. The parameter flush determines whether the corresponding local transaction will be guaranteed to have been flushed to disk or not.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定复制源的重播位置。参数 flush 确定是否将保证相应的本地事务已被刷新到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Returns the replay location for the replication origin selected in the current session. The parameter flush determines whether the corresponding local transaction will be guaranteed to have been flushed to disk or not.
trans-unit.target: 返回在当前会话中选择的复制源的重播位置。参数 flush 确定是否将保证相应的本地事务已被刷新到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of JSON path predicate check for the specified JSON value. Only the first item of the result is taken into account. If the result is not Boolean, then null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定JSON值的JSON路径谓词检查的结果。仅考虑结果的第一项。如果结果不是布尔值，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a JSON path predicate check for the specified JSON value. Only the first item of the result is taken into account. If the result is not Boolean, then NULL is returned.

trans-unit.source: Returns the time stamp of the last transaction replayed during recovery. This is the time at which the commit or abort WAL record for that transaction was generated on the primary. If no transactions have been replayed during recovery, the function returns NULL. Otherwise, if recovery is still in progress this will increase monotonically. If recovery has completed then this will remain static at the time of the last transaction applied during recovery. When the server has been started normally without recovery, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回恢复期间上次重播的事务的时间戳。这是在主数据库上生成该事务的提交或中止WAL记录的时间。如果恢复期间没有重播任何事务，则该函数返回 NULL 。否则，如果恢复仍在进行中，它将单调增加。如果恢复已完成，则在恢复过程中最后一次应用事务时，该消息将保持静态。当服务器正常启动但没有恢复时，该函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if an indexed item satisfies the query operator with strategy number n (or might satisfy it, if the recheck indication is returned). This function does not have direct access to the indexed item's value, since GIN does not store items explicitly. Rather, what is available is knowledge about which key values extracted from the query appear in a given indexed item. The check array has length nkeys, which is the same as the number of keys previously returned by extractQuery for this query datum. Each element of the check array is true if the indexed item contains the corresponding query key, i.e., if (check[i] == true) the i-th key of the extractQuery result array is present in the indexed item. The original query datum is passed in case the consistent method needs to consult it, and so are the queryKeys[] and nullFlags[] arrays previously returned by extractQuery. extra_data is the extra-data array returned by extractQuery, or NULL if none.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引项满足策略号为 n 的查询运算符（或者如果返回重新检查指示，则可能满足），则返回true 。由于GIN不会显式存储项目，因此该函数无法直接访问索引项目的值。相反，可用的是关于从查询中提取的哪些键值出现在给定索引项中的知识。该 check 阵列具有长度 nkeys ，这是与上述相同的由返回键的数目 extractQuery 此 query 数据。如果索引项包含相应的查询键，则 check 数组的每个元素为true，即，如果（check [i] == true） extractQuery 的第i个键结果数组存在于索引项目中。如果 consistent 方法需要参考原始 query 数据，则传递原始查询数据， extractQuery 先前返回的 queryKeys[] 和 nullFlags[] 数组也将传递。 extra_data 是 extractQuery 返回的额外数据数组，如果没有则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Row constructors can be used to build composite values to be stored in a composite-type table column, or to be passed to a function that accepts a composite parameter. Also, it is possible to compare two row values or test a row with IS NULL or IS NOT NULL, for example:

trans-unit.source: Row identifier
trans-unit.target: 行标识符

trans-unit.source: Row security can also be disabled with the ALTER TABLE command. Disabling row security does not remove any policies that are defined on the table; they are simply ignored. Then all rows in the table are visible and modifiable, subject to the standard SQL privileges system.
trans-unit.target: 行安全性也可以使用 ALTER TABLE 命令禁用。禁用行安全性不会删除表上定义的任何策略。他们只是被忽略。然后，表中的所有行都是可见的，并且可以修改，并且要遵循标准的SQL特权系统。

trans-unit.source: Row security policies can be specific to commands, or to roles, or to both. A policy can be specified to apply to ALL commands, or to SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE. Multiple roles can be assigned to a given policy, and normal role membership and inheritance rules apply.
trans-unit.target: 行安全策略可以特定于命令，角色或两者。可以指定一个策略以应用于 ALL 命令，或者应用于 SELECT ， INSERT ， UPDATE 或 DELETE 。可以将多个角色分配给给定策略，并应用常规角色成员身份和继承规则。

trans-unit.source: Row updates or deletions caused by foreign-key enforcement actions, such as ON UPDATE CASCADE or ON DELETE SET NULL, are treated as part of the SQL command that caused them (note that such actions are never deferred). Relevant triggers on the affected table will be fired, so that this provides another way in which a SQL command might fire triggers not directly matching its type. In simple cases, triggers that request transition relations will see all changes caused in their table by a single original SQL command as a single transition relation. However, there are cases in which the presence of an AFTER ROW trigger that requests transition relations will cause the foreign-key enforcement actions triggered by a single SQL command to be split into multiple steps, each with its own transition relation(s). In such cases, any statement-level triggers that are present will be fired once per creation of a transition relation set, ensuring that the triggers see each affected row in a transition relation once and only once.
trans-unit.target: 由外键强制操作（例如 ON UPDATE CASCADE 或 ON DELETE SET NULL )引起的行更新或删除被视为导致行更新或删除的SQL命令的一部分（请注意，此类操作永远不会被延迟）。将触发受影响的表上的相关触发器，以便提供另一种方式，使SQL命令可以触发与该类型不直接匹配的触发器。在简单的情况下，请求转换关系的触发器会将单个原始SQL命令在其表中引起的所有更改视为一个转换关系。但是，在某些情况下，存在 AFTER ROW 触发请求转换关系的触发器将导致由单个SQL命令触发的外键强制操作分为多个步骤，每个步骤都有其自己的转换关系。在这种情况下，每次创建过渡关系集时都会触发一次存在的任何语句级触发器，以确保触发器一次仅看到一次过渡关系中的每个受影响的行。

This option is ignored when emitting a script rather than connecting directly to a database server.

trans-unit.source: Running DROP DATABASE or ALTER DATABASE ... SET TABLESPACE on the primary will generate a WAL entry that will cause all users connected to that database on the standby to be forcibly disconnected. This action occurs immediately, whatever the setting of max_standby_streaming_delay. Note that ALTER DATABASE ... RENAME does not disconnect users, which in most cases will go unnoticed, though might in some cases cause a program confusion if it depends in some way upon database name.
trans-unit.target: 在主 ALTER DATABASE ... SET TABLESPACE 运行 DROP DATABASE 或ALTER DATABASE ... SET TABLESPACE将生成WAL条目，该条目将导致与备用数据库上的该数据库连接的所有用户被强制断开连接。无论 max_standby_streaming_delay 的设置如何，此操作都会立即发生。请注意， ALTER DATABASE ... RENAME 不会断开用户的连接，尽管在某些情况下如果它依赖于数据库名称，则在某些情况下可能会引起程序混乱，这在大多数情况下不会引起注意。

trans-unit.source: SCRAM with channel binding prevents such man-in-the-middle attacks by mixing the signature of the server's certificate into the transmitted password hash. While a fake server can retransmit the real server's certificate, it doesn't have access to the private key matching that certificate, and therefore cannot prove it is the owner, causing SSL connection failure.

trans-unit.source: SELinux User's and Administrator's Guide

trans-unit.source: SELinux access control decisions are made using security labels, which are represented by strings such as system_u:object_r:sepgsql_table_t:s0. Each access control decision involves two labels: the label of the subject attempting to perform the action, and the label of the object on which the operation is to be performed. Since these labels can be applied to any sort of object, access control decisions for objects stored within the database can be (and, with this module, are) subjected to the same general criteria used for objects of any other type, such as files. This design is intended to allow a centralized security policy to protect information assets independent of the particulars of how those assets are stored.
trans-unit.target: SELinux访问控制决策使用安全性标签来决定，这些安全性标签由诸如 system_u:object_r:sepgsql_table_t:s0 之类的字符串表示。每个访问控制决策都涉及两个标签：尝试执行该操作的主题的标签，以及要对其执行操作的对象的标签。由于这些标签可以应用于任何种类的对象，因此数据库中存储的对象的访问控制决策可以（并通过此模块）遵循与用于任何其他类型的对象（例如文件）的相同的通用标准。此设计旨在允许一种集中式安全策略来保护信息资产，而与这些资产的存储方式无关。

trans-unit.source: SELinux defines several permissions to control common operations for each object type; such as creation, alter, drop and relabel of security label. In addition, several object types have special permissions to control their characteristic operations; such as addition or deletion of name entries within a particular schema.
trans-unit.target: SELinux定义了几种权限来控制每个对象类型的普通操作,如安全标签的创建、更改、删除和重标。此外,一些对象类型有特殊的权限来控制它们的特性操作;如在特定模式中增加或删除名称条目。
